title: Formula E: Driver
overview: Formula E: Driver is a high-stakes, four-part series following the journeys of four of the sport's biggest personalities: António Félix da Costa, Mitch Evans, Jake Dennis and Dan Ticktum, as they navigate the challenges and victories across Season 10 of the ABB FIA Formula E World Championship.Each episode offers viewers a never-before-seen look into the lives of some of the Championship's most prominent figures.
